summary: Dashboard management app with order tracking. Fixing date format to DD/MM/YYYY and adding dashboard enhancements: search by order number/generic name/design code, full-row click selection, and per-group + bulk Mark Ready functionality.
known_issues: Date stored/displayed as MM/DD/YYYY instead of DD/MM/YYYY

existing_features.title: Fix date parsing in `frontend/src/utils/excelParser.ts` so that Order Date is always interpreted and stored as DD/MM/YYYY. The parser must not swap day and month (no MM/DD/YYYY treatment). It must correctly handle dates from any year, including 2025 and 2026. Both string-format dates (e.g. '19/02/2026') and Excel serial numbers must resolve to the correct DD/MM/YYYY value. Dates currently showing as 'No date' on the dashboard because of failed parsing (e.g. dates like 13/02/2026, 16/02/2026 shown in the uploaded screenshots) must be displayed correctly after the fix.

In the Total Orders tab (`frontend/src/components/dashboard/TotalOrdersTab.tsx`), add or extend the search bar so that it filters orders by Order Number, Generic Name, and Design Code. The search must be case-insensitive and filter across all design groups simultaneously, showing only matching rows (and their parent design group header if at least one row matches).

In the Total Orders tab, under every design group, make each order row fully clickable â€” clicking anywhere on the row (not just the checkbox) should toggle the row's selection state. This must work consistently across all design groups rendered in the tab.

In the Total Orders tab, add a 'Mark Ready' button inside each design group header/footer. Clicking it marks all currently selected rows within that design group as Ready. Additionally, when the top-level 'Select All' checkbox is checked, a bulk 'Mark Ready' button must appear at the top of the tab to mark all selected orders (across all design groups) as Ready at once.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix date format from MM/DD/YYYY to DD/MM/YYYY (supporting any year including 2025/2026)
Search bar in Total Orders tab to search by order number, generic name, and design code
Enable full-row click selection under every design group
Add Mark Ready button in each design group for individual marking, and show bulk Mark Ready on top when Select All is checked

projectName: Fix date format to DD/MM/YYYY and add Total Orders tab enhancements
